page.title: 01GENERAL INFORMATION PAGE
page.content: The twelve Km squares allotted to the Lawrence Sheriff School basically consist of the following: The majority of our area is covered by farm land, much of which is used to grow arable crops.The remainder provides grazing for cattle and sheep. In these squares there are also five villages.Harborough Parva and Little Lawford are very small -consisting of only a farm and two or three houses-and are therefore not included in our survey.Long Lawford, King's Newnham and Church Lawford are larger and are described in greater detail later on in the text. This information is illustrated under specific titles on the following pages.
